Author: A

Over in the yard next door you see Emily, the two-year-old neighbor girl. She was sitting down in the grass playing with a ball. You've always liked Emily. She's a sweet girl and you often babysit over at her house when her parents need it. Of course, now at this size, she would be quite a handful. You can't help but wonder what her reaction would be to see her babysitter tiny.

As quickly as you can, you navigate through the grass and over to where the giant two-year-old is sitting. The closer and closer you get, you start to realize how massive this giant baby really is to you. You begin to shake the fear the closer you get however. You can't help but let out a little "aww" finding her even cuter at her larger size. It looks like her mother dressed her in her pink overalls with a white t-shirt. You smile at the thought that you're probably small enough to ride in her front pocket.

After watching her play ball for a few moments, you build up the courage to show yourself. Cautiously, you approach her leg and stand next to the pink fabric of the overalls. You clear your throat.
"Hey, Emily!" You shout.
Suddenly, the two-year-old stopped playing ball and looked around.
"Down here, Emily!" You shout again.
The two-year-old finally looked down at you. A chill ran down your spine, not sure if you should run while you still can or stay.
"It's me, Emily! Molly! Your babysitter!" You should.
The giant toddler looked down at you for a few moments, sucking contently on her pacifier. Suddenly, Emily reaches down for you. Quickly you try to run, but her pudgy finger wrap around your body and lifts you up to her face. At this point you don't know what to think. Your heart is pounding, although you should've known this would happen.
"Dollwey!" Emily said sloppily behind her pacifier.
"No, no, Emily! Molly, not dolly!" You shout.
The girl ignored your peas. She pulled back her overalls pocket and dropped you in. Quickly, you straighten yourself out and try to peer out of the pocket. Emily suddenly stands up, making you loose your grip and fall down into the pocket again. This wasn't good, Emily kept her favorite toys in her pocket and you were joining them. It was just a matter of time before she went in to play with you.

As Emily goes back inside...

113112.content:
You're able to pull the trigger at the exact moment that Emily grabs you. Your arms pinned at your sides, your finger stuck on the trigger, you're helpless as the beam of light from the ray gun encompasses both yourself and the two year old.

"Huh?" Emily says, a little confused, as she watches her room slowly become smaller. Her head soon comes into contact with the ceiling. Realizing she has to get out, the toddler smashes her free hand through a nearby window. Glass, wood and cement all rain down on the front yard as Emily tries to crawl outside.

Shaking the dust and plaster out of her hair, the girl stands up to her full height, already the same size as her house. You struggle to get free, which causes Emily to hold you more firmly in place, which in turn only accelerates her growth.

Her mother emerges from the front door soon after, first looking at the damage to her property, then staring up at her 40 foot daughter. Unable to form words, it's Emily who speaks. "Mommy widdle!" she exclaims, going past 50 feet, before giggling and taking off down the street.

Cars swerve to avoid her growing shoes. The people who were outside begin to flee, as the two year old notices them around the neighborhood. "Ooh, more dowwies!" she says happily, making her way towards them.

Deciding there were a lot more interesting things around her at the moment, Emily decides to put you safely on the ground, then take off again, 75 feet tall now and still growing. You cough, trying to catch your breath, then check the gun in your hands, to make sure it was working properly. Satisfied that it was, you run after the enormous child, hoping she willl listen to you at her current size.

"Emily! Hey, Emily! Stop!" you yell over the panicking crowd around you. Either unable to hear you over the noise or just ignoring you completely, the toddler is instead focused on something she sees a few blocks over. "Twoys!" her voice boomed as she sailed past 100 feet tall and cleared the distance between wherever she wanted to go in two earth shattering footsteps.

You eventually catch up to the giant girl. Out of breath, you look up to see a 125 foot tall Emily squatting down next to a house, to inspect it more closely. Apparently, there was a birthday party going on in the backyard, because you could see the outline of a Bouncy Castle and a few party-themed vehicles parked out front. Luckily, everyone seemed to have run off before Emily arrived.

"Hey, Emily!" you yell again, as the toddler was busy lifting a car the size of her hand off of the ground and peering inside.

Does Emily hear you this time?

1131122.content:
You sigh in frustration at being unable to get Emily's attention when suddenly, a wicked thought crossed your mind: What if you grew her even more? What was the worst that could happen? She was only a 2 year old playing around. Besides, if she became too big, you could always just shrink her back to normal, right?

Making your way behind her so you wouldn't be seen and standing a fair distance away from Emily, you fire and watch her grow again. 125 feet becomes 140, then 150. The girl seemed oblivious to anything that was happening to her, until her expanding shoes plowed through the house she was squatting next to.

You let go of the trigger as she looked around, confused as to why the neighborhood was becoming smaller once more. She dropped the car she was still holding and made her way to the backyard, easily clearing the roof of the partially destroyed house in the process and you follow her, staying out of sight.

You fire again and Emily sails past 200 feet in a matter of moments. The giant girl hears people screaming nearby and goes to investigate, her booming footsteps causing even more panic. At 225 feet, she bends down and grabs a car trying to drive past her and brings it up to her face. She pokes it playfully with her index finger a few times, shattering most of the windows and terrifying the people inside. She places the car back on the ground once she realizes they don't want to play with her and moves on, now more than 250 feet tall.

You stop firing and follow Emily's path of destruction, wondering where she was going. You run past flattened houses and crushed cars. Dodging the huge craters her shoes were leaving behind held you up as you run past them. You wonder if the 2 year old knew how much damage she was causing now as she approached 300 feet tall. She was by far the largest thing around for several miles, at least until she made it to downtown. Which you hoped Emily stayed away from, at least until you caught up to her.

Finding an abandoned car along your journey, you hop in and drive towards the toddler, hoping you could close the gap soon.

1132.content:
Author: rugbyguilt

Molly sees a teenage boy standing on the sidewalk. She laughs to yourself as she makes her way over to him, anticipating his reaction when he sees her.

David was a 16 year old high schooler. He was like any other boy his age. He was interested in hanging out with his friends, downloading music off the Internet. Oh, yeah. And boobies. Lots and lots of boobies

He had an average build, he wasn't a jock by any means, but he stayed in shape David was standing on the sidewalk, waiting for one of his friends to pick him up so the two of them could go to the mall.

Molly slowly approached David, making sure he didn't see her too soon. She wanted to relish this.

She looked up at him, amazed that she was so small when compared to him. Molly began waving her arms around, trying to get his attention. No luck. Then, she started yelling up at him, but because she was so much smaller now, her voice couldn't travel very far.

Getting frustrated, she looked behind her to see a rock on the ground. She went over to it to pick it up. Of course, at her current size, the rock was much heavier than she expected. In fact, the tiny stone came up just past her knees.

Molly lifted it, guessing that it had to weigh close to 50 pounds now. She struggled to press it over her head, before letting it drop a few feet in front of her, in defeat.

Molly sighed angrily. The boy didn't even notice the tiny woman standing next to him. She put her hands on her hips, trying to come up with another solution.

A few moments later, it came to her. It was so stupid, as she thought about it, but it was probably the only way to get his attention.

Molly ran towards David's shoe as fast as she could, hoping this would work. She plowed into the side of his shoe, bouncing off the rubber soul a few feet in the process. She shook her head a little as she laid on the ground. She inspected her body, ,making sure she wasn't badly hurt. Aside from the dull pain in her shoulder and left arm, where she hit the boy's shoe, she was relatively unharmed.

Far above her, David felt a soft thud hit the side f his shoe. "What the hell?" he said, peering down. Upon closer inspection, he discovered a tiny girl laying next to him on the ground. He bent over to pick her up, his giant hand descending on the girl fast.

On the ground, Molly saw the boy's hand coming towards her and she immediately jumped to her feet and started running. Unfortunately, in her reduced state, her short legs couldn't carry her as far as would have liked and, after running only a few inches (it ft much farther to Molly, however), David's hand enveloped her and she could feel her body leaving the ground.

Molly was brought up to the giant boy's face, and David looked down at her with a huge grin on his face. Suddenly, and without saying a word, he stuffed the tiny girl into his jacket pocket and left.

Where does he go?
1132.title: David

choices: David plucks the gun from her hands
11321.content:
Author: rugbyguilt

David stuffed both of his hands into his jacket pocket, to make sure his tiny captive didn't escape, and walked casually back to his house. He could always go to the mall, but to have some fun with a tiny woman was too good an offer to pass up. He would just call Justin when he got home and tell him something came up.

He went inside his parent's house and immediately ran upstairs to his bedroom, his hands still in his pockets. He got to his bedroom and closed the door behind him. David then took out the shrunken woman and placed her on his bed, tossing his jacket in the corner of his bedroom a moment later.

He got down on his knees to inspect the woman closer and Molly recoiled in fear. This wasn't what she had in mind when she decided to get his attention originally.

"Hey there, tiny girl," David's voice boomed out towards her. "My name's David. What's yours?"

"M-Molly," the shrunken woman meekly squeaked out. She looked up at him. He looked enormous. To her point of view, he was probably close to 750 feet tall. He was a giant, horny teenager. The worst kind for a woman her size to be around. He stared at her lustily, entranced by her breasts poking through her shirt.

Suddenly, David's left hand came in close to her and scooped her up again. He laid her down on his palm and started fondling her breasts. Molly initially resisted, trying to desperately push the massive digit away from her, but he was far stronger than she was at this point, and she eventually just gave up.

David pulled Molly's shirt and pants off with relative ease, leaving her in just her bra and panties. She screamed and covered her breasts with her hands, The boy laughed at the girl's futile efforts and easily pried her hands away and resumed. A few moments late, he took one of his giant fingers and started rubbing against Molly's private area.

Molly just sat back and took it, sobbing silently to herself. There was nothing she could do. She was utterly powerless now.

Just then, David's mother called out from downstairs. "David, your friend Justin is here."

David growled angrily, setting Molly down on his bed again. "I'm kind of busy now," he yelled back, hoping everyone would leave him alone.

"You're not too busy to come downstairs and tell him yourself, are you?" she replied.

David sighed, looking down at the tiny girl. She was curled up in the fetal position, crying, while her hands covered her breasts once more.

"Don't move," David said down to her. Molly slowly nodded her head. The boy left the room, leaving Molly all alone.

Molly sat there for a couple of minutes, as the events of the past several minutes started to register in her brain. She had been violated by a boy many times her own size. This wasn't supposed to happen. She was supposed to walk up to him, introduce herself and scare the kid, before running off into the nearest patch of weeds and start the process all over again with someone else.

Now, she was nothing more than a sex toy, a tiny teaching aid for the boy to learn about the female anatomy, before testing it out on the "real thing" with a girl close to his own size.

She sighed, accepting her new fate. If only there was some way to escape. Some way to get back at the kid. If only she had the ray gun...

Wait a minute. Sh still had the ray gun. It was in the front pocket of her pants. If she could get to it in time and grow herself back, she could escape.

Molly wiped the tears from her eyes and walked over to her clothes. Luckily, David had not tossed them over the side of the bed, or she really WOULD be screwed. She walked over and dug out the gun.

Just then, David re-entered the room. He walked over to Molly and saw she was holding something in her hands. "Whatcha got there, Short Stuff?" he teased. He saw something glowing in her hands and he brought his hand closer to her again, curious.

Molly panicked. She COULD NOT afford to have the gun taken away from her.

What happens?

Brad stood up and looked at the buildings around him. He found one that was about knee high to him. He ripped off the roof and smiled at the screaming toys inside. Several more logs crashed into the diaper, making the diaper bulge so much that the people in the building were pinned to the floor. Brad still wasn’t done as he opened up the flood gates. He looked down and smiled as his diaper started to sag as it absorbed his pee. When he was all done, he put his full weight on the building. It couldn’t hold the weight of a 200ft toddler with a full diaper and crumbled to the ground, killing everybody inside. Sarah just smiled at her brother and said, “Bwad in stinky diapa.”

Molly watched the whole thing and walked over. She could see just how full the boys’ diaper was. She picked him up and could smell the diaper. “Baby’s diapa need changing.” She checked Sarah again to make sure she didn’t make a mess, and she didn’t. “Stay here while I change your brother” Molly told the little girl.
Molly walked down the street, looking for some diaper changing supplies. Then she found the local supermarket. She set Brad down, crushing a few buildings beneath his full diaper. He knew what was happening and lay down and spread his feet for Molly to change his diaper. Molly ripped off the roof of the building. Then she packed the bags with the supplies, except a diaper, some wipes and powder to change Brad.

When she turned around, she was surprised to see Brad already laying on his back with his legs spread. “That’s a good baby”, Molly told the “little” boy. She slid a clean diaper beneath Brad’s old one. Then she undid the Velcro on the diaper and lowered it to the ground. “Whew Bwad made vewy big stinky.” She used the old diaper to clean him up as best she could, and finished with a few wipes. She put the old wipes in the diaper, folded it up, and slid the diaper out from beneath him. She rolled it up into a ball and set it aside. Then she started tickling the baby. After that, she put her hands in front of her face and played peek a boo for a little while. Brad was giggling the entire time. Knowing that boys like to make a mess between diapers, she put on the baby powder and rubbed it in. Then she pulled the clean diaper up and velcroed it nice and tight. I gulped in fear, as I lifted my neck even higher towards her sports bra, and up to the dizzying top of her head, which was crowned with dark hair that was neatly braided into rows.

All told, the African Giantess must have been 500 ft tall! Even the tallest buildings in the town rose no higher than her waist! I admired her powerful large body in a state of awe, but also in fear, as I realized how easily she could destroy me by even the slightest exertion of her amazing strength.

"Lady.. lady? who am I kidding. Hey Insect, up here" ordered Donna. Instantly, my eyes were looking at her face. Again, Donna was looking at me, as if she was scanning my body and reading my thoughts. She then saw the small gun I was holding in my hand.

"You, give me that thing you're holding in your hand" I had no other choice but to comply. I reached out and with dexterity, Donna's left hand grabbed the small gun. As soon as it was in her hand, it grew to accommodate her.

"Interesting" she said while trying to figure out how it worked. But the gun was probably the most simplistic device in the world and it didn't take long for her to comprehend.

Sophie then saw a sparkle of light coming down near the mailbox. She crouched down to take a look and picked up the object that was resting on the pavement. To her amazement, the object grew to her size when she touched it. Not wondering what it was yet, she putted it inside her waist.

Bringing her hands on her hips, Sophie smiled as she could now see above all trees and houses in the neighborhood. "Wow, this is so cool, I'm still getting taller, and it isn't stopping" she laughs. Sophie stood where she was, growing, and happy that her growth spurt was still going.
15112.title: Sophie, bratty 15 yo sister, long blond hair, s...

152.content:
Author: rugbyguilt

"This thing is worthless," I think to myself, tossing the toy into the trash compacter. I sigh with frustration, disappointed I couldn't use it the way I wanted.

I go out to the front porch, and sift through the mail "Bill, bill, 'You may have already won...', yeah, right." I go back inside, tossing the mail on the nearest table. "That was a complete waste of time," I think to myself.

I head back into the kitchen to find one of my younger sister's friends holding the toy gun. The two girls have been friends since the first grade. They're both 11 years old now. She's busy fiddling with the controls, turning the knobs back and forth. I chuckle to myself, knowing it's just a toy and go over to the coffee pot to pour myself a cup of coffee.

Suddenly, the gun goes off, striking the kitchen table. The two of us watch in amazement as the table shrinks down to a couple of inches tall. I approach the table, picking it up to inspect it. It's just like it's always been, only smaller. I set it back down on the floor and stand back up to find my sister's friend pointing the gun at me.

"Ashley, what are you doing?" I ask, backing away slowly. The eleven year-old smiled deviously up at me.

Then, she fires.
152.title: The Gun's Worthless

choices: I started to get even taller.
I started to shrink (not back to normal)
My sister was coming down stairs to see all the commotion.
15221.content:
"Ashley, what are you doing?" I ask, backing away slowly. The eleven year-old smiled deviously up at me.

Before I could do anything, the ray fired a blinding light at me, covering my entire body, and giving my body a tingling sensation of what feels like pins and needles for only a second. My vision was still blurry from the ray's light, and I was starting to feel a little dizzy, barely able to stand. "Ashley, what on Earth was that?" I ask Ashley." And how did you get the... ray to..." Cutting my sentence short as I noticed my sisters friend was shorter then a few seconds ago. In fact, the whole kitchen room seemed to be getting smaller, and my entire body started to heat up.

Ashley was looking up at me with a gleeful smile on her face and she seemed to be blushing, as her face was pinkish-red all-over. 'Is she actually enjoying this?' I thought to myself. At this point,I started to realize my clothes were constrict my expanding body as I passed what felt like 5'8. I guess the ray effect only one thing at a time. My head was getting dangerously close to the ceiling and my clothes were starting to feel uncomfortable, as Ashley was still amazed at what she had done. But as things were looking dire for me, my body felt cooler again and my field of view was no longer getting smaller any more. My head would probably touch the ceiling if I stand up straight, and it a pretty low ceiling, so I was probably six feet tall.

"Oh... Oh God..." I said under my breath in a state of mild panic, barley able to move myself at all. "What just happened to me. No, I just experienced what happened to me. The real question is, WHY did this happened to me?" Then I quickly remember the ray Ashley used on me, I look to her direction, and see her slowly walking closer to me. "Well, If it makes you feel any better... I think you look a bit.. better this way." She said slightly nervous. I decided to move closer to her and try to convince her to shrink me back to normal. "Now Ashley, this is nice and all, but how about we use tha- AHH!" I felt a sharp pain where my clothes were as I started to move. "Are you okay Molly?" asked the eleven year old."Yeah, I'm fine." I told her "But my clothes are Very uncomfortable now, there to tight on me." " Oh, well.. if they feel to tight, maybe you should... umm... T-t-t-tear them off..."she said. Did a eleven year old girl, much less my sister's friend, suggest me to tear of my clothes? all I could let out of my mouth was "What?" "Well, your clothes won't make you feel uncomfortable if you... Don't have any..."She said with her voice trailing quieter. That's where I draw the line, and I snapped at her. "Why on Earth would I do that!? Do you get a kink out of this kind of thing or Something?"

At that moment she was staring at my taller body with glee on her face, no longer paying mind to my words. She began to fire up the ray again and aimed point blank at me. 'Oh Crap' I thought to myself.
15221.title: Ashley's "BIG" Desire

choices: My sister thinks she is still dreaming
1523.content:
Author: rugbyguilt

Ashley turns the gun around, points the gun at herself and fires. Immediately, she begins growing, and I watch as she goes from 4'3", roughly the same height of my breasts, to more than six feet.

She's staring down at me now, reveling in how much taller she is than me now. For years, she had always been picked on for being the shortest girl in her class. Ashley had nicknames like "Shrimp," or "Pigmy." It wasn't her fault; she just had a growth hormone problem. Well she would never have that problem again.

Ashley took a few steps toward me and I instinctively move back a little. I'm only 5'2" myself, so to look up at an eleven year old that is more than a foot taller than me t this point was a little bit scary.

Don't get me wrong; she wasn't a bad kid. It's just that she always seemed to have a rebellious streak in her, always causing trouble or acting out in some way. She even got my younger sister suspended for a few days once for convincing her to throw a rock through the classroom window of a particular teacher that was giving both girls a hard time.

Ashley took one giant step and is standing in front of me. I look up into her face, as she puts her hands on her hips. I think about running. I turn around, ready to take off, but before I can get even a few feet away, Ashley grabs me by the arm. I pull repeatedly, trying to break her grip, but she's far stronger than I am.

"Where do you think you're going?" she asks me, a serious look on her face. She lets go of my arm and points the gun at herself again, growing another 2 feet. I am now even with her chest.

The giant girl looms over me, stepping forward and bumping me playfully with her body. I bounce back a few steps with each bump, grunting in pain with every impact.

She stops soon and laughs at my peril. "Hey, I know," she says, her face brightening up. "Let's go upstairs and play with your sister"

"Well, I don't think that's such a good--" Suddenly, Ashley grabs my arm and drags me along with her. I have to run to keep up, or risk my shoulder becoming dislocated.

The 11 year old soon ascends the stairs, and I hear as each step groans loudly underneath, the increased weight of the girl becoming too much for the wooden panels to take.

We approach my sister's room and Ashley knocks loudly. I hear my sister stir inside and she soon comes to the door, staring up at her humongous friend and seeing me standing beside her.
1523.title: Ashley grows

choices: Molly tries to get the gun back

"Ashley?" Amy asked, clearly puzzled "H-how did you get that big?

"With this" Ashley was holding the device in front of her for Amy to see.

"Like this" she replied with a smile, holding the gun and firing another shot at her. Like the other 2 time, it happened quickly, and got a little more than she thought. Ashley's already tall frame shot up rapidly into the air and stopped when her head bumped into the 12 foot ceiling of the hallway.

152321.content:
Author: Zaibach

I couldn't bare this situation no more and I had to do something. Without further hesitation, I jumped on Ashley's right hand to try and take the gun back. But it was of no use, her grip was too firm and her strength too great.

With her left hand, Ashley pushed me down on my sister. We both fell down on the floor. Ashley began laughing at my failed attempt to get the gun back.

"You two are so pathetic, I'm out of here, and none of you better follow me"

Once outside, Ashley pulled the trigger and didn't release her finger from it. Again, she was growing.

"I'm going to rule the world" an evil smile forming on her lips. She was in love with growing. To be big is all she wanted. Actually, to be COLOSSAL is what she really wanted, and she was on the path to become the biggest.
152321.title: No such luck.

152322.content:
Author: Plusi

"Well then girls, I think its playtime!" Ashley said, looking down at her sisters, the elder of whom was less than half her height. "But first, I think you should both massage my giant feet. Growing on the spot makes them chaff against the floor!"

Molly responded "Ashley, stop this now, we are not your play things! Shrink back down to your normal size and throw that thing away!". Ashley wasn't pleased with this comment from her sister. She locked the bedroom door, and loomed over Molly with thunderous footsteps toward her

"Thats what you think, midget. Remember that? You kept calling me that, and it hurt alot. Now I think its time you started making things up to me. You aren't in control...". Ashley takes a deep breath, slams her massive foot on the ground, and yells "I AM! Now get down on your knees and massage my feet"

"No! You can't do this Ashley!" Molly said. Ashley looked down at her sister and said "Yeah, whatever shorty. I warned you". After that, Ashley grabbed Molly by the arm and lifted her into the air with one hand. She chuckled a little and muttered "Hah, so light". She dropped Molly to the floor who fell on her arse. Ashley then put her foot in Molly's face and yells "LICK IT! LICK IT SHRIMP!". Molly wasted no time in complying with her sisters demands, regardless of how disgusting it was. Amy was nearly in tears in the corner of the room, when Ashley looked at her and said "I don't want to do that to you, but I will if you don't get the hell over here now". Amy wasted no time in scurrying over, and rubbing her giant sisters feet.

Ashley then collapsed onto Amy's bed, snapping loads of springs with numerous loud TWANGS within the mattress. "Come on girls, please your big sister before I have to get rough with you."
152322.title: Ashley's massive aching feet
